[img]https://i.imgur.com/NOW7jU1.png[/img] [h1]Rename any storage building![/h1]
Shelves are great! They keep things tidy, remove beauty debuffs from contained items, prevent decay outdoors, and look great!
But unlike stockpiles, you can't rename them!
Well now, with the help of [i]Shelf Renamer[/i], you can!
[b]All storage buildings with customisable storage now have a 'Rename' button![/b] You can rename shelves, hoppers, even storage buildings added by other mods!
Give something an empty name and it will return to its original name.
Safe to add to existing saves.
Shelf names will show up on [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=784327493]Industrial Rollers'[/url] zone select.
[b]Powered by HugsLib and Harmony.[/b]
[h1]Recommended Mods[/h1]
For an even better shelf experience, use Shelf Renamer with:
- [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1180721235]RimFridge[/url] - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1435092881]Small Shelf[/url] - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=945085502]No Default Shelf Storage[/url] - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1339148170]Room Food[/url]

Special thanks to:
